org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions

Class PropagatingMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions.Message
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions.PropagatingMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnounceMessage, BidRequestMessage

    public abstract class PropagatingMessage
extends Message
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This Message is used to propagate an arbitrary message to all sites. Specific messages should overload the handler method, making sure to call super().

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

      PropagatingMessage(Auction auction)
      Creates a new BidRequestMessage from the specified parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Used to maintain a seperate hopcount for each iteration. We cheat here by maintaining a global _contactedSites list, which each P2P mediator updates via the addContactedSite() method (indirectly)
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • handler

        public void handler(P2P mediator)
        This is the entry point, called by the P2P mediator. Classes that extend this method must call this method for message propagation to work.
        Specified by:
        handler in class Message
        Parameters:
        mediator - the P2P Mediator that received this message
